text: One storm day, a Christian bishop was in his cathedral, and a non-Christian woman came up to him and said, "I'm not a Christian. Is there salvation from hellfire for me? "No, " he answered", only water and the Spirit can save those who are baptized. And while he was still speaking, a thunderbolt fell upon the cathedral, and it was overtaken by fire. And the men of the city came running and saved the woman, but the bishop was consumed, food from the fire. FIN
title: El relámpago
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
